title: WHY NO URF????
body:
You take out Dominion, because no one plays it. You bring it back on rotating, and it gets played twice in 3 weeks. This is the third, or more time that Ascension is on. Less dumb modes, more URF, it's been like 2 months, come on man!


-____-

replies.body:
Even people who don't praise URF like it's a god among game modes admit that it should be put back into the rotation, since every other game mode (aside from nemesis draft) has been played.

Seriously we JUST got Nexus Siege two week in a row, and now we're getting it again in September.

URF OP - haters will hate !
RITO step ur game up ! it's season 6 and u act like bloody amateurs !

URF was an issue so they removed it from rotation until they could place a fix. The same champs were getting picked to just cheese everyone. 
Riot will most likely implement permanent bans on those champs like they did for Teemo and Karthus in All For One. 
So blame your buds for spamming the same champs over and over again in URF for having the mode removed and worked on for god knows how long.

>
> Riot will most likely implement permanent bans on those champs like they did for Teemo and Karthus in All For One.

I stopped reading there.

1. You still can play Teemo and Karthus in OFA, sorry to break your dreams.
2. I don't see why Riot would ban champions on OFA. I admit, Zed is op, Evelynn is op, and Sona is also op, but these are just a few champs that are mostly play on URF.

There's plenty of champs that are also played than them. So if we follow what you're talking about, they'd ban like almost half of the champion pool.

Oh, also, they said that they'd put URF at least TWICE every year. So they'll maybe put URF again.

It wouldn't be half, there were a very select few that could create majorly unfair advantages, like Riven being untouchable because of her escape being on no cooldown and Evelynn spamming you to death in seconds with Hate Spike. There are a handful of champs that URF truly broke.

Deleting posts, cuz I didn't notice you put a post there.
Anyways

On URF:

Zed is op
Evelynn is op
Sona is op
Thresh is op
Singed is op
Mundo is op
Katarina is op
Shaco is op

And more champion are op on URF. I'll stop the list here anyway.
alistar, teemo, shaco, wu kong, etc. the thing about urf is......EVERYONE IS OP!! that was kinda the point of the game. that's what made it fun......

Riot can't patch without breaking everything. I think there should only be a ban phase like every other rotating mode. If people don't want the same champs, then don't play. Additionally, every mode is the same champs, people will always pick the cheese regardless, so maybe no one should play? URF is by far the best, maybe we could do URF AND rotating so everyone is happy. Just stupid as shit to play Dominion so close together when it was so unplayed it was removed from the game all together when it was offered as a full time option.
Urf lives matter. If you don't like urf, you aren't a real person.

URF is terrible, I hate it. Playing it legitimately makes me want to kill myself.

...but I am bored of every mode tbh, its been rotated so much, I can only stand so much Hexakill. I'd say it's about time to bring it back tbh
